property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger. Noble.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faramir gets +1 Û for each enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Gondor ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached ally gains the Outlands trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Return X Outlands allies from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: If each of your heroes has a printed Ï resource icon, Knight of Minas Tirith gains: "Response: After Knight of Minas Tirith enters play, choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and exhaust Knight of Minas Tirith to declare it as attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Û for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Craftsman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pelargir Shipwright gets +1 Ò for each hero you control with a printed Ê resource icon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ê hero.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play Map of Earnil by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Ê resource icon.
Action: Discard Map of Earnil to play any Ê event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ranger character. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Ranger Bow and attached character to deal 1 damage to an enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control at least 1 Ranger character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Deal 3 damage to an enemy with at least 1 Trap card attached to it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Noble hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Planning Action: Exhaust Palantir and attached hero to name a card type and look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that matches the named type, draw a card. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, raise your threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player chooses 1 enemy and 1 unique location and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: When an Osgiliath location leaves play as an explored location, the first player takes control of that location.
If the players control all Osgiliath locations in play at the end of the round, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk. Mordor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add the topmost Orc enemy from the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls. (All attachments he controls instead if undefended.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk. Mordor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Uruk Soldier attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller returns a location he controls to the staging area, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 1 for each location he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: While engaged with a player, Southron Phalanx gets +1 Û for each location that player controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each location the defending player controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Southron Commander makes an immediate attack from the staging area against each player who controls at least 1 location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: If there is no active location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Osgiliath location, reveal it and add it to the staging area. Then, make West Gate the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: After the player who controls West Gate lets an attack go undefended, return West Gate to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value:
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.
Forced: After the player who controls The King's Library lets an attack go undefended, return The King's Library to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The players cannot travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Combat Action: Exhaust a hero to place 1 progress token on Ancient Harbor.
Forced: After the player who controls Ancient Harbor lets an attack go undefended, return Ancient Harbor to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The players cannot travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Planning Action: Spend 2 resources to place 1 progress token on The Old Bridge. (1 resource instead if there is another Osgiliath location in the staging area.)
Forced: After the player who controls The Old Bridge lets an attack go undefended, return The Old Bridge to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: While West Quarter is the active location, the current quest gains siege. (Characters quest using Ú instead of Ò.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: While East Quarter is the active location, the current quest gains battle. (Characters quest using Û instead of Ò.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 progress token on Ruined Square.
Forced: If a player controls Ruined Square when a character leaves play, return Ruined Square to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value:
Travel: If there is 1 active location, exhaust a character to travel here. (There are now 2 active locations.)
Forced: After the player who controls Ruined Tower loses control of a location, return Ruined Tower to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add X to the archery total this round. X is the number of locations the players control. If the players control less than 4 locations, Pinned Down gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an Osgiliath location is discarded. The first player may exhaust a hero to take control of that location. Otherwise, add that location to the staging area. This effect cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Assault on Osgiliath

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must return the location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area, or raise his threat by the total $ of all locations he controls.
